_comment: ⚠️ SECRET TEMPLATE - DO NOT COMMIT WITH REAL VALUES ⚠️
_comment2: This is a template showing the structure of secrets stored in Google Secret Manager
_comment3: When you run './dev secrets download' or './prod secrets download' and the secret doesn't exist,
_comment4: this template will be automatically copied to dev.secrets.json or prod.secrets.json for you to edit
_comment5: After editing with real values, use './dev secrets upload' or './prod secrets upload' to upload

etrade._comment: Default E*TRADE token expiration is 1 day. Contact E*TRADE support to request a longer duration.
